title: Gentleman Cho'Gath... 1850? Seriously?
body:
I know this has probably been discussed before, but why in the heck is this skin 1850? I made the sad mistake of buying this skin just to find that it has no special ability particle effects, and nothing happens when you feast, besides "nom.nom.nom" which if im not mistaken his base model does that. 

Can we get a visual update for this skin? or reduce the price and get refunded the difference? 

Hope everyone is having a good day

replies.body:
You could have.. i dont know, looked at a skin spotlight before buying it?

You want a _refund_ because you bought something without knowing what it is? Welcome to reality..

1850 skins are legendary tier skins meaning they have a VO...like he does. if you pay attention to the actual skin and the voice lines instead of "WHAI IT HAS NO ABILITY PARTICLES RITO WHAI" You would see it has different lines. It was an older legendary skin and it would get more special particles if/when cho gets a VGU.

1) Only spoiled rich kid would buy a legendary skin before actually looking it up on youtube or something, so I dont care in the slightest

2) Its one of the first legendary skins ever made, so of course its outdated

3) It still has the best voice lines out of any skins in the game, fuck the particles and other useless stuff
Would you like some cheese with your whine?

Cho in general needs a VGU.

Will it happen before they drop Gentleman Cho down to "Epic" tier like Piltover Customs Blitzcrank? (1350.) In that case they refund the difference
There are far worse "legendary skins" than gentleman Cho, such as both Corki ones, the TF one, the Heimer one etc...
The TF one doesn't have a new VO like Gentleman Cho does, but it looks nicer than Gentleman Cho.
Have you seen Magnificent {{champion:4}} ? The only "legendary" thing about that skin is it's name.
And the cape, and the top hat. Magnificent {{champion:4}} is great if you like {{champion:4}} .
I like TF, but I hate that skin. Underworld and Cutpurse are my favorite skins.
My favorite skins are Magnificent, Jack of Hearts, Tango, Underworld, Cutpurse, Musketeer, High Noon, and Blood Moon.
HAHA! you bought a lemon and deservedly so.
Just wait till his rework. The skin will be amazing.
